titleStmt.title: God wooing his church: set foorth in three godly sermons. / By William Burton preacher at Reading.
titleStmt.author: Burton, William, d. 1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V.S. for Iohn Hardie dwelling in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Tygers head.,

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border; headpieces (McK. 303); printer's device; initials.
Imperfect: cropped; tightly bound; print show-through with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in: Peterborough Cathedral.

place.placeName: Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Tygers head.
